backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report JSON stub with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains textual summaries for all major frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling prize verification flow and state transitions.
frontend/src/components/ActivationFlow.t: User interface for activating a verified prize number with simulated backend call.
frontend/src/components/CompletionScreen: Displays final prize status such as ineligible, pending review, or claimed.
Checklist-based eligibility confirmation interface before identity verification.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with copyright notice and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo and title branding the Winner Verification Portal.
frontend/src/components/IdentityVerifica: React component for uploading and validating face and ID photos, showing previews, errors, and submitting verification.
frontend/src/components/PrizeLookup.tsx: Form to enter and validate a prize number, simulating a backend lookup and returning mock prize data.
frontend/src/components/ReceiptMethod.ts: Collects user delivery details for physical or digital prize receipt with form validation and simulated submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hooks for backend prize operations, wired to actor but returning mock/null data for now.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom colors, fonts, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines project state, rebuild requirements, deployment issues, and lists existing features for the prizeâ€‘winner verification app.
